Definition.WordDefinition: upbeat adj : pleasantly (even unrealistically) optimistic [syn: {cheerful}, {pollyannaish}] n 1: a contented state of being happy and healthy and prosperous; "the town was finally on the upbeat after our recent troubles" [syn: {wellbeing}, {well-being}, {welfare}, {eudaemonia}, {eudaimonia}] [ant: {ill-being}] 2: an unaccented beat (especially the last beat of a measure)
